name: Enchanted Sword
description: A magical sword imbued with powerful enchantments.
looks: The sword has a shining silver blade with intricate runes etched into its surface. The hilt is made of polished ebony and adorned with a sparkling gemstone.

special_effects.elemental_damage: Adds additional fire damage to attacks

name: Healing Potion
description: A magical potion that restores health.
looks: The healing potion is contained in a small glass bottle with a stopper. The liquid inside is a vibrant green color.

name: Staff of Healing
description: A staff imbued with powerful healing magic.
looks: The staff is made of smooth white wood and has a glowing blue gemstone at the top.

special_effects.healing_aura: Emits a constant healing aura that restores nearby allies' health.

name: Enchanted Sword

name: Demonic Staff
description: A sinister staff infused with dark magic.
looks: The staff is carved from blackened oak and adorned with ancient runes. It emanates a dark and ominous aura.

special_effects.shadow_blast: Unleashes a powerful blast of dark energy that damages enemies in an area.

special_effects.elemental_damage: Adds additional fire damage to attacks

name: Crystal Staff
description: A powerful staff made from a rare crystal found deep within the earth.
looks: The staff is crafted from a transparent crystal with a smooth surface that reflects light. It is adorned with intricate carvings of magical symbols.

special_effects.mana_leech: Drains 5 mana from the target with each successful hit
special_effects.spell_power: Increases the power of spells cast with this staff by 50%

name: Ring of Power
description: A mystical ring that grants great power to its wearer.
looks: The ring is made of pure gold and features an intricate design of ancient symbols. It emits a soft, radiant glow.
